snippet: Zbynek Michalek and Chris Kunitz scored first-period goals, and the Pittsburgh Penguins beat the visiting Phoenix Coyotes, 2-1, for their sixth straight victory.
abstract: Pittsburgh Penguins beat Phoenix Coyotes, 2-1, for their sixth consecutive victory.
lead_paragraph: Zbynek Michalek and Chris Kunitz scored first-period goals, and the Pittsburgh Penguins beat the visiting Phoenix Coyotes, 2-1, for their sixth straight victory.
